original_text: And they went in to the king into the court, but they laid up the roll in the chamber of Elishama the scribe, and told all the words in the ears of the king.
korean_text: 그들이 두루마리를 서기관 엘리사마의 방에 두고 뜰에 들어가 왕께 나아가서 이 모든 말을 왕의 귀에 아뢰니

sentences.original_text: And they went in to the king into the court
but they laid up the roll in the chamber of Elishama the scribe
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 두루마리를 서기관 엘리사마의 방에 두고

sentences.original_text: and told all the words in the ears of the king
